name: MetCredit
tagline: The fastest results IN DEBT COLLECTION
description:
MetCredit is your national debt collection agency, headquartered in Edmonton, with physical offices in Mississauga, Montreal and Vancouver. We are licensed and bonded as a debt collection agency in all Canadian provinces and territories. Metcredit is an accredited BBB business. Credit reporting to Dun & Bradstreet, Equifax and Transunion, we service all consumer and commercial credit grantors across Canada.
Count on MetCredit to collect quickly, treating debtors with respect at all times to preserve customer relationships wherever possible.
